content: What if you could stop one thing you do every day? What would you eliminate?
What if you could choose one superpower and be guaranteed to wake up with it tomorrow? Which would you choose?
What if you could swap lives with anyone for a week? Who would you choose?
What if you could add one hour to your day that no one else gets? How would you spend it?
What if people came with caution labels? How would yours read?
What if you could change one decision you made in the last year? What would it be?
What if your younger self could see who you've become? What would surprise them most?
What if you could overcome a fear that you've struggled with your whole life? What would that be?
What if you had to describe the part of yourself you keep hidden from most people? What would you say?
What if the person closest to you could read your mind for one day? What would worry you most?
